### About

I'm currently leading the Data Science team at Kapitalo Investimentos, responsible for developing tools to improve economic research. I'm also the author of [R for Economic Research](http://book.rleripio.com){target="_blank"}, my first book in which I teach indispensable tools to produce professional economic analyzes using R language.
